name: Synchronized Clocks
description:
In celebration of Hot Scientific Clock reaching 100+ DLs, a SEQUEL was born for SuNoFes 2020....

SYNOPSIS

When the clock stops ticking, time ends.

After Jikan confessed his love to his childhood friend Toki, his internal clock can't stop ticking! Well it'd be bad if it did, since that's a metaphor for heartbeats... ANYWAY... now they are dating, but soon, will a rival appear to take his sweet time away?

FEATURES:
- 1,300+ words
- Fully voiced dialogue
- Characters reprising their role
- A new character
- Clock pick-up lines
- 3 endings

- RESOURCE CREDITS -
List of free-to-use resources used in the game

Sprite art by Crescent Moon Arpeggio
SFX from freesound.org by user multiple users (listed in endroll)
Music tracks by Kevin MacLeod, amachamusic, * CAMeLIA *, Alcaknight, and H/MIX
Ending song by Trial and Error
BGs & Clock from Pixabay
